How was your cavity search?
-Fun. -Need to find a way to reach Henry.
translation.ko: 재미있었어 - 헨리한테 연락할 방법을 찾자 - 안 돼, 너무 위험해

translation.en: No, it's too risky. We just do what they want.
translation.ko: - 헨리한테 연락할 방법을 찾자 - 안 돼, 너무 위험해 그냥 시키는 대로 하자

translation.en: They'll disappear. Your family will be safe.
translation.ko: 놈들은 사라질 거고 너희 가족은 안전할 거야

translation.en: Wait a second, who's Henry? Henry, your best friend from college?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 헨리가 누구야? 헨리? 당신 대학 때 절친?

translation.en: Let me guess. You didn't go to college together?
Honey, he's the U.S. Marshal assigned to my case.
He came over for Thanksgiving when Kevin was a baby.
translation.ko: 케빈이 아기였을 때 추수감사절에 놀러 왔었잖아

translation.en: I baked him cranberry cornbread, and he said he loved it.
translation.ko: 크랜베리 콘브레드 구워주니 헨리가 진짜 좋아했었지

translation.en: It was a prescheduled home visit. He did love the cornbread. We all did.
translation.ko: 예정된 가정 방문이었어 그 콘브레드는 다들 진짜 좋아했고

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't he love the cornbread?
Your Excellencies,
my wife, the Countess Van Der Holt.
Very beautiful.
Yes, I'm a very lucky man.
I have never forgotten that.
OK, that's it. That's it. That's it! Alright, we're going home.
It touched my mouth. What happens if it goes in my mouth?
translation.ko: 입에 닿았어, 입에 들어갔어 들어가면 어떻게 돼?

translation.en: Remember when Kevin drank a glow stick and poison control said to give him milk.
translation.ko: 케빈이 야광봉 삼켰을 때 독극물 관리 센터에서 우유 먹이랬어, 우유 좀 주세요

translation.en: Can I get milk? I need some milk! Can I get some milk?
translation.ko: 우유 먹이랬어, 우유 좀 주세요 우유가 필요해요! 우유 좀 주세요!

translation.en: Please excuse our assistant, he has not been feeling well.
translation.ko: 죄송합니다, 저희 비서가 - 몸이 안 좋네요 - 식중독이에요

translation.en: Food poisoning. [in French] Terrible.
translation.ko: - 몸이 안 좋네요 - 식중독이에요 - 끔찍하죠 - 뇌가 중독됐어요

translation.en: -[Ron retching] -[in English] Poisoning of the brain.
-[Margot chuckles softly] -[sighs] You know, you know what?
[chuckles] I think I'm OK.
-I'm alright, I'm OK. -[they chuckle]
-You know what? I think… I overreacted. -[Leo laughing]
I've a strong immune system. I'm... I overreact a bit. Nice to meet...
translation.ko: 제 면역 체계는 강한데 좀 과민 반응했네요, 만나서 반...

translation.en: Oh God... I think I'm OK.
-[retches] -[security] Move back!
[Mim] It just looks like somebody's gross house.
What kind of freak would actually live down here?
[woman] What kind of freaks would go snooping around when they didn't live here?
translation.ko: 무슨 괴물들이 여기 살지도 않으면서 기웃거릴까?

translation.en: Good point.
-No! Kevin, no! -[woman] Start talking.
translation.ko: 케빈, 안 돼! 말해, 여긴 어떻게 찾았지?

translation.en: How did you find this place?
Our mom had a key! Her name's Margot Finch!
Don't know her. Wrong answer.
-[Kevin yelps] -No. Mathilde Tremblay!
He means Mathilde Tremblay.
I think she sent us here.
-How do you know Mathilde? -[Kevin] She's our mom!
I think she's our mom. Please don't hurt me.
translation.ko: 우리 엄마인 거 같아요 제발 살려주세요

translation.en: [woman] Oh, yeah. You have her eyes.
So, you know her?
Yeah. We were like sisters.
Wow. Mom is not like I thought she was.
translation.ko: 와, 엄마 과거가 내가 생각한 거랑 다르네

translation.en: Oh. Right.
[sighs] I just got off a job.
Oh, where do you wo...
Oh, you... you stole that stuff.
Not like a big deal or anything. We steal stuff all the time, right?
translation.ko: 뭐 대단한 일도 아니죠 안 훔치는 사람 없잖아요?

translation.en: One time, I took two puddings at lunch. I'm a real bad boy.
translation.ko: 전 푸딩 2개 먹은 적 있어요 진짜 나쁜 아이죠

translation.en: Kevin. Could you maybe just…
tell us everything you know about my mom?
We grew up together. Pulling jobs. Just kids' stuff, you know.
translation.ko: 같이 자랐어, 슬쩍하면서 애들 하는 짓 있잖아

translation.en: Scamming tourists, pickpocketing, petty theft, your basic B and E.
Your idea of "kid stuff" is, like, a lot different than ours.
translation.ko: 그게 애들 하는 짓이라니 우리 생각이랑 많이 다르네요

translation.en: Then we got mixed up in some bad stuff with this guy named Jean-Paul.
translation.ko: 그러다 장 폴이란 남자랑 나쁜 일에 엮이고 말았지

translation.en: J-Jean-Paul! That's the guy Henry was talking about.
translation.ko: 장 폴, 헨리 아저씨가 말했던 그 사람이야

translation.en: He's in prison now, but his people, they came after my mom
translation.ko: 그 사람은 감옥에 있는데 부하들이 엄마를 찾아왔어요

translation.en: and now they're planning this huge job, and we're trying to find her.
translation.ko: 큰 도둑질을 계획하고 있는데... 우리가 엄마 찾으려고요

translation.en: What makes you think she wants to be found?
That necklace you're wearing.
She left us the same one to get down here.
translation.ko: 똑같은 걸 두고 갔는데 그게 여기 열쇠였고

translation.en: She left us tons of clues, they all led here.
translation.ko: 다른 단서도 많이 남겨서 여기 올 수 있었어요

translation.en: I think she wanted us to find you so you could help us.
translation.ko: 아줌마를 찾길 바랐나 봐요 도와주실 수 있으세요?

translation.en: [woman] Your mom gave me something before she went into witness protection.
translation.ko: 너희 엄마가 나한테 뭘 줬어 증인 보호 받기 전에 말이야

translation.en: She said I would know if it ever came time to open it.
translation.ko: 열어야 할 때가 오면 내가 알 거라고 했지

translation.en: -[Clancy] What is that? -[Kevin] It's a pager.
My God, the olden days were tragic.
It's not a pager.
It's an old tracking device.
[Ron] OK, I'm much better now.
Ahh... OK. Yeah. That's all. No more is comin'... [groans]
Yeah, I think I'm done.
Oof! Stay away from the seafood dip.
If I'm giving advice, stay away from the seafood dip
translation.ko: 조언을 좀 드리자면 해산물 소스는 피하세요

translation.en: because it's mayonnaise-based.
So, it's just not a good call.
So, just stay awa-- [groans]
Mm, OK. [laughs] I thought it was coming out of both ends.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 이번엔 위아래로 나오는 줄 알았네

translation.en: But it didn't… [sighs] It didn't.
We're good. Everybody, we're good.
What happened to your accent?
What happened to my...
[in bad French accent] How dare you, sir?
What? Who? Sir!
How dare you...
say something like that to me
-in front of the royal family? -Save it.
-Do what? -We put in a call to your consulate.
These... are fake.
There is no Count or Countess Van Der Holt.
Well, what time did you call?
-Maybe it was lunch and they-- -Keep on them.
-I'm gonna go and get this sorted out. -Yeah.
translation.ko: - 스트레칭 후 산책하러... - 이거 해결하고 올게

translation.en: No, I'm saying, to get a croissant or…
Both ends.
Alright, she must have had a personal tracking device
translation.ko: 어디 보자, 그래 무슨 일이 생길 걸 대비해서

translation.en: implanted on her in case something ever happened.
translation.ko: 개인용 추적 장치를 몸에 심어뒀을 거야

translation.en: The Grand Concert Hall downtown.
Duran Duran! They said something about the Crown of Duran Duran!
translation.ko: 듀란 듀란! 듀란 듀란의 왕관을 어쩐다고 했어요!

translation.en: Durámuran? The Crown of Durámuran?
Oh, Lord... It's the Holy Grail.
They've been tracking that for years.
Your mom and I tried to steal it from the Louvre. [sighs]
translation.ko: 예전에 너희 엄마랑 내가 루브르 박물관에서 훔치려 했었어

translation.en: That's a good bedtime story.
There's an event tonight at the Grand Concert Hall. A big gala.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 그랜드 콘서트홀에서 행사가 있어, 대규모 연회야

translation.en: You know what? If the crown is at that gala, so is your mom.
translation.ko: 그 연회에 왕관이 있다면 너희 엄마도 거기 있겠지

translation.en: OK, great! Let's go!
Um... no. I'll handle it. OK? You guys stay here. It's not a kids' job.
translation.ko: 아니, 내가 해결할게 여기 있어, 애들 일 아니야

translation.en: No. We have to go. We're not gonna get hurt, I promise.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저희도 가야죠 안 다칠게요, 약속드려요

translation.en: Aw, that's so sweet. I don't care if you get hurt.
You'll slow me down, blow my cover.
translation.ko: 내 발목 잡고 눈에 띄게 할까 봐 그래

translation.en: Uh, we're not slowing anybody down. We can blend in, right?
translation.ko: 저희 발목 안 잡아요 우리 눈에 안 띌 수 있잖아?

translation.en: Is that so, General?
Actually, this insignia is for the rank of commander.
But historically correct facts are not important right now.
translation.ko: 하지만 지금 역사적 사실이 중요하진 않겠죠

translation.en: Non-negotiable, OK?
Your mom sent you here so I would keep you safe, not send you off to get killed.
translation.ko: 너희를 여기로 보낸 건 너희를 보호해 달라는 거지 목숨 걸게 하라는 게 아니야 편하게 있으렴

translation.en: Make yourselves comfortable. There are video games, peanut butter…
translation.ko: 목숨 걸게 하라는 게 아니야 편하게 있으렴 게임기도 있고, 땅콩버터랑...

translation.en: -I'm allergic to peanuts. -Same.
[sighs] You're not coming.
OK, fine.
But, uh, just out of curiosity, what is your plan?
translation.ko: 근데 그냥 궁금해서 그런데요 계획이 뭐예요?

translation.en: I'll go into an air vent that'll lead me to the subway
and take me directly to the Grand Concert Hall downtown.
translation.ko: 시내의 그랜드 콘서트홀로 곧바로 갈 수 있지

translation.en: Anything else?
Yeah, which vent was that?
[grunts] The one right over...
Please don't find me and kill me. I just need to get my mom back.
translation.ko: 저 찾아내서 죽이지 마세요 엄마를 구해야 해서 그래요

translation.en: -Not bad. -[chuckles] Although I definitely will find you and kill you.
translation.ko: 제법이네, 그래도 넌 내가 꼭 찾아내서 죽일 거야

translation.en: -You'll kill her, but we're cool, right? -Thanks, lady.
Oh! Come on!
-I'm not allowed on public transport-- -We know!
translation.ko: 나 보호자 없이 대중교통 타면 - 안 되는데 - 알아!

translation.en: Where now?
-Um... This way! Come on. -[Kevin] OK!
[Mim] We're never getting past that security.
I don't know about you guys, but we might be able to get in.
translation.ko: 누나들은 몰라도 우리는 들어갈 수 있을걸

translation.en: Have you seen yourself?
Oh, you're right. It's the cravat.
Hey, what about up there?
[Clancy] Window's open.
You'll never fit.
I'll do it.
Oh, doesn't your mom have a rule about breaking into buildings at night?
translation.ko: 너희 엄마가 한밤중 건물 무단침입은 하지 말라고 안 해?

translation.en: My mom is not here.
-He took off the cape. -OK.
-[Lewis] Hold my hat. -Snap!
[groans] Come on, Lewis.
Make it happen, Lewis. [grunts]
-You can give me a hand with this part. -[Mim] Right.
translation.ko: 이쯤 됐으면 좀 도와주지? - 그렇네 - 참, 그냥 보고 있었네

translation.en: -We were watching. -[Kevin] I had the hat.
-[Clancy] Sorry. There you go. OK -[Mim] There it is.
[Kevin] You got this!
-[Lewis grunts] -[Kevin] Squeeze! Squeeze!
-Oh my God. -Oh my God. Look at that.
-He's really doin' it- -[Lewis yelps]
-[thud, clatter] -Uh-oh. It's OK. Walk it off.
-You're good. -[Clancy chuckles]
-Does he know where to go? -I hope so.
translation.ko: - 나오는 길은 잘 찾을까? - 그래야 할 텐데

translation.en: OK.
Hey! What are you guys doing back here?
Uh, we... We were just, um…
Oh my gosh, we've been wandering around this place forever.
So, uh, which way to the stage? Yeah, we just need to set up.
Just got in from Denver. What a cluster that airport is. Am I right?
translation.ko: 덴버에서 막 왔거든요 그 공항은 사람이 어찌나 많은지

translation.en: Never been there.
We're the kid musical ensemble booked for tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 공연하기로 한 어린이 뮤지컬 앙상블이에요

translation.en: Paul Revere's Midnight Ride?
Never heard of us? We're pretty big on YouTube.
translation.ko: 우리 못 들어봤어요? 유튜브에서 꽤 유명한데

translation.en: Mim, show him the video. The viral one.
translation.ko: 밈 누나, 영상 보여드려 요즘 유행인 그거

translation.en: Two-point-three million hits and climbing.
Come on. You think we dress like this for kicks?
Alright, alright, come on.
[Kevin] Good evening. Tut-tut. We are Paul Revere's Midnight Ride.
We have an amazing performance planned for everyone here.
translation.ko: 여기 계신 분들을 위해 굉장한 공연을 준비했어요

translation.en: So, to kick the night off,
we have Cool Clancy on the cello.
-Let's strike up the band! -[tepid applause]
[whispers] Sit down.
[whispers] Kevin...
[whispers] No. [sighs] I can't... I'm not like you.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 난 못 해, 난 너랑 달라

translation.en: [sighs] I knew it. I knew it!
Uh... Security?
We got a mess down here on the stage. Kids in pilgrim shoes.
translation.ko: 여기 무대에 문제가 생겼다 순례자 신발 신은 애들이다

translation.en: -[oboe squeaks] -Clancy, we need you to go. Now.
I can't play in front of all these people.
translation.ko: 케빈, 이렇게 사람 많으면 나 연주 못 해

translation.en: Of course, you can. You got this! Quickly!
translation.ko: 못 하긴 왜 못 해 할 수 있어! 서둘러!

translation.en: -[sighs] I'm not ready. -Yes, you are.
translation.ko: 나 준비 안 됐어 누나는 준비됐어 누나는 정말 재능 있다니까

translation.en: -You're so talented. -I need backup ASAP, please.
translation.ko: 누나는 준비됐어 누나는 정말 재능 있다니까 즉시 지원 바란다 프릴 셔츠 입은 애들이다

translation.en: We got kids in puffy shirts. I need backup!
translation.ko: 즉시 지원 바란다 프릴 셔츠 입은 애들이다 지원이 필요하다!

translation.en: -Backup ASAP, please! Thank you. -Wait, wait.
Alright, we've got new orders to take 'em to the embassy.
translation.ko: 자, 영사관으로 데려오라는 새 명령이 내려왔어

translation.en: FBI is involved. Apparently, there's some security risk.
translation.ko: FBI가 연루됐더군 무슨 보안 문제가 있나 봐

translation.en: Take care of it.
Oh, you two have a secret code now, a secret language.
translation.ko: 오, 둘만의 암호가 있네 둘만의 언어가 있어

translation.en: Is that what's going on? That's... perfect.
-[Leo speaking French] -What does that mean, Leo?
-Duck! -[Ron] What?
-[guard 3 grunts] -What's happening?
Uh, cancel that. They're legit.
translation.ko: 어, 지원 요청 취소다, 진짜 맞아

translation.en: Let's go.
Where'd you learn that? Did you just kill that guy?
translation.ko: 그런 거 어디서 배웠어? 저 사람 죽인 거야?

translation.en: No, I just crushed his windpipe a little.
He'll be fine with immediate medical attention.
"Crushed his wind pi--" Have you ever killed anyone?
translation.ko: 숨통을 좀 눌러... 당신 사람 죽인 적 있어?

translation.en: No! Our paramilitary training taught us how to neutralize a target
translation.ko: 없어! 준군사 조직 훈련에서 4초 안에 상대를 무력화시키는 법을 배웠어

translation.en: in under four seconds using mostly non-fatal tactics.
translation.ko: 준군사 조직 훈련에서 4초 안에 상대를 무력화시키는 법을 배웠어 대부분 비치명 전술이지

translation.en: "Paramilitary training"? "Non-fatal"?
You made me open up a jar of mustard for you last week. You faked it!
translation.ko: 지난주에 나한테 머스터드 병 열어달라더니, 날 속였구나!

translation.en: -I faked it. -Oh my God. Is our whole life a lie?
translation.ko: - 속인 거야 - 맙소사, 우리 인생 다 가짜야?

translation.en: -What do we... What do we... What... -[Margot panting]
Who did I marry?
Is that Clancy?
Sounds like Clancy.
Clancy.
[Margot] Kids, stay there. I'm coming for you.
translation.ko: - 엄마? - 얘들아, 거기 있어, 내가 간다

translation.en: Mom!
Is this what Mom does when we're asleep?
translation.ko: 우리 잘 때 엄마 저러고 다녀?

translation.en: Oh... knock it off!
-Dad does not look good. -Nuh-uh.
Oh my God, she looks amazing!
There's a guy there.
Make way! Move!
-Crown. Get the-- -[man screams]
Come on, jump!
-Clancy. -Hi.
We gotta get outta here.
-Come on! -[Ron] How did you guys get here?
-[overlapping voices] -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Is that gonna be my car? Can I learn to drive?
[Mim] So great. Then we found a secret hideout. [Kevin] Then, Jay tracked you with your GPS chip.
translation.ko: - 비밀 은신처를 찾았어요 - 친구분이 GPS 칩으로 추적했어요

translation.en: [Margot] Kids, I'm sorry I got you involved in all this.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 이런 일에 말려들게 해서 정말 미안해

translation.en: No, Mom. I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.ko: 아니에요, 엄마 그런 말 해서 정말 죄송해요

translation.en: You're not pathetic, you're amazing, and I know you might miss your old life,
translation.ko: 엄마는 안 한심해요, 굉장해요 예전의 삶이 그립겠지만

translation.en: but we had to find you and try and get you back. Just please don't go.
translation.ko: 엄마를 되찾아야만 했어요 제발 가지 마세요

translation.en: Honey, I would never leave you!
Hey, old friend.
Looks like your grand plan worked. Here I am. And I…
translation.ko: 네 대단한 계획이 성공한 것 같네 나 왔어, 그리고...

translation.en: pulled a twofer.
Course you did.
-Yeah. -[Ron] Sorry, do we know her?
Oh, don't worry, she's a good guy. Well, kind of a bad guy.
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요, 좋은 사람이에요 아니, 나쁜 사람이긴 한데

translation.en: She's a good bad guy.
-We should go. -Go.
I'm gonna keep 'em busy, erase all the footage…
translation.ko: 난 할 일이 많아 여기 영상 다 지우고...

translation.en: Hey, you. No, no, no. Hand over the Rolex.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 너, 안 되지, 롤렉스 내놔

translation.en: You have, like, a thousand.
Thank you, good bad guy.
